28
Ontological Engineering
Copyright © 2005, The University of Manchester
Defined Classes
•
We’ve created a Defined Class, CheeseyPizza
– It has a definition. That is at least one Necessary and Sufficient 
condition
– Classes, all of whose individuals satisfy this definition, can be inferred 
to be subclasses
– Therefore, we can use it like a query to “collect” subclasses that 
satisfy its conditions
– Reasoners can be used to organise the complexity of our hierarchy
•
It’s marked with an equivalence symbol in the interface
•
Defined classes are rarely disjoint
speaker: SYSTEM
